title: Making a balanced aquarium
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Plymouth Productions
brief_description: Two children make a balanced aquarium in a glass tank. They demonstrate the step-by-step procedures of collecting soil and river gravel, placing these and the water in the tank, gathering and planting pond weeds, and then obtaining fish and other water animals to complete their aquarium.
